item.title: I need help (with my server)
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

Problem 1: I don’t see whats wrong right there

Problem 2: What ‘things’?

Problem 3: [code]if(command.startsWith(“allrunes”))
{

    addItem(554, 100000);
    addItem(555, 100000);
    addItem(556, 100000);
        addItem(557, 100000);
        addItem(558, 100000);
        addItem(559, 100000);
        addItem(560, 100000);
        addItem(561, 100000);
    addItem(562, 100000);
        addItem(563, 100000);
        addItem(564, 100000);
        addItem(565, 100000);
        addItem(566, 100000);           
    }[/code] (take out the else)

Problem 4: Go to line 6358 in client.java and change the line to:

teleportToX = 3222;

Read full topic

item.title: I need help (with my server)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

To fix the error: Go into your client.java, search for (Match Case)ToX = 3222; with Ctrl+F, , add a teleport infront of it, so it looks like teleportToX = 3222;

I cant help you with the other things, Im at school.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help (with my server)
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

ok im am using nixscape source and i have the following probloms (theres alot beer with me)

[glow=red,2,300]Problem 1.[/glow] ok i cant add more then one type of mod heres wat mod cmd looks like

[code]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“dylan”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“hi1674”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("(Name)"))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else
{
playerRights = 0;
}

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// //
// New Player Rights //
// //
//////////////////////owners/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) ) {
status = “Owner”;}
/////////////////////coders//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“dylan”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“dylan”) ) {
status = “Coder”;}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“hi1674”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“hi1674”) ) {
status = “Coder”;}
////////////////////admins///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”)||playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) ) {
status = “admin”;}[/code]
now only “dylan” and “pure” work “hi1674” isint coder (wont work)

[glow=red,2,300]Problem 2.[/glow] ok now how do i edit how much att, str, def, magic xp you get for things (att, def, str, magix xp is only working like normal rs)

[glow=red,2,300]
Problem 3.[/glow] one of my commands is not working the command i have written in the client is

[code]if(command.startsWith(“allrunes”))
{

    addItem(554, 100000);
    addItem(555, 100000);
    addItem(556, 100000);
        addItem(557, 100000);
        addItem(558, 100000);
        addItem(559, 100000);
        addItem(560, 100000);
        addItem(561, 100000);
    addItem(562, 100000);
        addItem(563, 100000);
        addItem(564, 100000);
        addItem(565, 100000);
        addItem(566, 100000);           
    } else[/code]

IS NOT WORKING
BUT

if (command.startsWith("guthan")) { addItem(4724,1); addItem(4726,1); addItem(4728,1); addItem(4730,1); } does work wats wrong here?

[glow=red,2,300]Problem 4[/glow] ok when i start my server i get this

client.java:6358: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ToX location: class client ToX = 3222; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Starting FusionScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 and i never edited n e thing like that

Read full topic
